languages.text: "Благодарю тебя за подарок, достойный варагира, Железношкурый". {n}Ульфар взвешивает в руке новое оружие, и на лице его возникает то довольное выражение, что бывает лишь на лицах истинных воинов, нашедших себе идеальное оружие по руке.{/n}

"Thank you for this gift worthy of the Varagyr, Ironhide." {n}Ulfar tests the weight of his new weapon, and his face bears that satisfied expression seen only on the faces of true warriors who have found the perfect weapon for their hand.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Благодарю тебя за подарок, достойный варагира, Железношкурый". {n}Ульфар взвешивает в руке новое оружие, и на лице его возникает то довольное выражение, что бывает лишь на лицах истинных воинов, нашедших себе идеальное оружие по руке.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Thank you for this gift worthy of the Varagyr, Ironhide." {n}Ulfar tests the weight of his new weapon, and his face bears that satisfied expression seen only on the faces of true warriors who have found the perfect weapon for their hand.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Thank you for this gift worthy of the Varagyr, Ironhide." {n}Ulfar tests the weight of his new weapon, and his face bears that satisfied expression seen only on the faces of true warriors who have found the perfect weapon for their hand.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Thank you for this gift worthy of the Varagyr, Ironhide." {n}Ulfar tests the weight of his new weapon, and his face bears that satisfied expression seen only on the faces of true warriors who have found the perfect weapon for their hand.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Thank you for this gift worthy of the Varagyr, Ironhide." {n}Ulfar tests the weight of his new weapon, and his face bears that satisfied expression seen only on the faces of true warriors who have found the perfect weapon for their hand.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Gracias por un regalo digno de los Varagyr, Piel de Hierro». {n}Ulfar prueba el peso de su nueva arma y en su cara aparece la expresión satisfecha que solo se ve en un guerrero que ha encontrado el arma perfecta para su mano.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Thank you for this gift worthy of the Varagyr, Ironhide." {n}Ulfar tests the weight of his new weapon, and his face bears that satisfied expression seen only on the faces of true warriors who have found the perfect weapon for their hand.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Gracias por un regalo digno de los Varagyr, Piel de Hierro». {n}Ulfar prueba el peso de su nueva arma y en su cara aparece la expresión satisfecha que solo se ve en un guerrero que ha encontrado el arma perfecta para su mano.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “谢谢你这份礼物，铁皮，它足以配得上一位瓦拉吉尔。”{n}乌尔法掂了掂新斧头，脸上露出了满意的表情。只有真正的勇士找到自己最趁手的武器时，才会露出这种表情。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Thank you for this gift worthy of the Varagyr, Ironhide." {n}Ulfar tests the weight of his new weapon, and his face bears that satisfied expression seen only on the faces of true warriors who have found the perfect weapon for their hand.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “谢谢你这份礼物，铁皮，它足以配得上一位瓦拉吉尔。”{n}乌尔法掂了掂新斧头，脸上露出了满意的表情。只有真正的勇士找到自己最趁手的武器时，才会露出这种表情。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「ヴァラギールにふさわしい贈り物に感謝するよ、アイアンハイド」{n}ウルファーは新しい武器の重みを感じているが、その顔には、その手に完璧な武器を見つけた真の戦士の顔にのみ見られる満足そうな表情が浮かんでいる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Thank you for this gift worthy of the Varagyr, Ironhide." {n}Ulfar tests the weight of his new weapon, and his face bears that satisfied expression seen only on the faces of true warriors who have found the perfect weapon for their hand.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ヴァラギールにふさわしい贈り物に感謝するよ、アイアンハイド」{n}ウルファーは新しい武器の重みを感じているが、その顔には、その手に完璧な武器を見つけた真の戦士の顔にのみ見られる満足そうな表情が浮かんでいる。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Merci pour ce cadeau digne des Varagyrs, Peau-de-Fer. » {n}Ulfar soupèse sa nouvelle hache et son visage arbore l'expression satisfaite que seuls arborent les vrais guerriers qui ont trouvé une arme parfaitement adaptée à leur main.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Thank you for this gift worthy of the Varagyr, Ironhide." {n}Ulfar tests the weight of his new weapon, and his face bears that satisfied expression seen only on the faces of true warriors who have found the perfect weapon for their hand.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Merci pour ce cadeau digne des Varagyrs, Peau-de-Fer. » {n}Ulfar soupèse sa nouvelle hache et son visage arbore l'expression satisfaite que seuls arborent les vrais guerriers qui ont trouvé une arme parfaitement adaptée à leur main.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Danke für dieses Geschenk, dass den Varagyr würdig ist, Eisenhaut." {n}Ulfar prüft das Gewicht seiner neuen Waffe, und sein Gesicht trägt den zufriedenen Ausdruck, den man nur auf der Miene wahrer Krieger sieht, die die perfekte Waffe für ihre Hand gefunden haben.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Thank you for this gift worthy of the Varagyr, Ironhide." {n}Ulfar tests the weight of his new weapon, and his face bears that satisfied expression seen only on the faces of true warriors who have found the perfect weapon for their hand.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Danke für dieses Geschenk, dass den Varagyr würdig ist, Eisenhaut." {n}Ulfar prüft das Gewicht seiner neuen Waffe, und sein Gesicht trägt den zufriedenen Ausdruck, den man nur auf der Miene wahrer Krieger sieht, die die perfekte Waffe für ihre Hand gefunden haben.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Varagyr'a layık bu hediye için teşekkür ederim Demirpost." {n}Ulfar yeni baltasının ağırlığına ölçüyor. Yüzü, sadece mükemmel silahı bulmuş gerçek savaşçıların suratında görülen memnuniyet ifadesine bürünüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Thank you for this gift worthy of the Varagyr, Ironhide." {n}Ulfar tests the weight of his new weapon, and his face bears that satisfied expression seen only on the faces of true warriors who have found the perfect weapon for their hand.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Varagyr'a layık bu hediye için teşekkür ederim Demirpost." {n}Ulfar yeni baltasının ağırlığına bakıyor. Yüzü, sadece mükemmel silahı bulmuş gerçek savaşçıların yüzünde görülen memnun bir ifadeye bürünüyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
